channel.title: Website cert fail
channel.description: I am a Carloop fan but guys, your website puts up an immediate roadblock because your certificate is invalid. You're losing visitors before the welcome mat! Also, the home page has no About Us, no Contact Us. As a small company, you want to be approachable and this is the opposite of that.

item.title: Website cert fail
item.dc:creator: jvanier
item.description:
Yep, the Let’s Encrypt SSL certificate expired tonight and the script to renew it didn’t run on schedule. So the certificate was expired until I ran the script. That’s now fixed for next time.

We’ll definitely include additional contact info on the website. Thanks for reminding us!

Read full topic

item.title: Website cert fail
